parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets tooltip border color of given control. Color is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetTooltipColorBox''' color

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> color: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetTooltipColorBox]] [1, 0, 0, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetTooltip]], [[ctrlSetTooltipColorShade]], [[ctrlSetTooltipColorText]]
</value></part></template>
